Calculator

Class UserInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • Calculator.UserInterface

  • public class UserInterface
extends java.lang.Object

    Title: UserInterface Class.

    Description: The Java/FX-based user interface for the calculator. The class works with String objects and passes work to other classes to deal with all other aspects of the computation.

    Copyright: Lynn Robert Carter ï¿½ 2019

    Version:
    4.00 2018-01-24 The JavaFX-based GUI for the implementation of a calculator, 4.01 2018-01-29 Added the sub, mpy and div method which perform the required computations., 4.02 2019-02-19 Aman added the log method to calculate the log base 2 Jatin tested the methods so that it properly works., 4.03 2019-03-20 Aman added the FSM code Jatin added the functioning of FSM and declared all the variables needed to run the FSM, 4.04 2019-04-06 Added the algorithm for the Addition, subtraction, multiplication and division for the error term Added the new attributes to accept error term, changed the constructor to accept the error term, 4.05 2019-09-29 Made the changes in the add, sub, mpy, div and sqrt methods so that they do the calculation with UNumber, 4.06 2019-11-24 Made the changes in the add, sub, mpy, div and sqrt methods so that they do the calculations with Units, 4.07 2020-03-12 Made the changes in the UI for Programmable Calculator
    Author:
    Lynn Robert Carter (Baseline), Jatin Thakur

    • Constructor Detail

      • UserInterface

        public UserInterface(javafx.scene.layout.Pane theRoot)
        This method initializes all of the elements of the graphical user interface. These assignments determine the location, size, font, color, and change and event handlers for each GUI object.
